Changeset.Change: moved to common subsystem
porting to featherweight stack
removed the ASL dependency
Added gCubeItems
Added application folder
Moved to java 7
Added ACLs
Added groups, users and privileges manager
Added trash folder
Added locks in: unshare, move, remove and share operation.
Removed clones in unshare and remove operations.
Added a default preview used when the original one is not available.
Moved from the "home-library" user to the real username to call the StorageManager library (for accounting).
Reduced calls to StorageManager library in upload operation, using tmp files
Removed clones when a shared folder is removed from the workspace
Added a private copy of an ex-shared folder for owner and administrators
Added search by properties for gCube items.
Added id to trash items
Fixed bug updating a shared file
Added searchFullText method to Workspace
Better performance
Added progress number to filename when a file with the same name already exists
Added getAdministratos() in WorkspaceSharedFolder to retrieve administrators of shared folders
Added setAdmin() in WorkspaceSharedFolder to set administrators
Changed Workspace.moveItem() method to return the new item, instead of null.
Added method isTrashed() to WorkspaceItem
Added method getPrivilege() to WorkspaceSharedFolder to retrieve the privilege set on a shared folder.
Added method setAdmins() to WorkspaceSharedFolder to set new administrators and remove the old ones.
Renamed setAdmin() in addAdmin() in WorkspaceSharedFolder.
Improved getUniqueName copying ang moving files
Added WorkspaceItem.isTrashed() method
Added unescape saving remothePath to storage
Fixed in getPath() method in trashed items
Added possibility to change permission in subfolders
Fixed Uri Resolver method
Added feature to move a shared folder in a private folder
Added @Deprecation to unknown class
Fixed bug in WorkspaceItem: title and description were missing
Fixed bug retrieving last items
getACL() methods moved to Abstract Folder
Fixed bug creating a new VRE folder
Using http connections throught jackrabbit webapp instead of rmi connections
WorkspaceMessageManager#sendMessageToPortalLogins method now returns the messageId and not Void (#894)
Workspace#searchByName limited to a specific folder (#739)
Feature #2020: Zip the contents of a folder without including the folder itself;
Feature #2765: HL: add multiple properties to WorkspaceItem constructor;
Feature #2505: Home Library Enhancement: getting zip file for list of WorkspaceItem;
Feature #2646: HL: Remove portalLogin in UserManager methods;
Feature #2458: HL: add mime type to MimeTypeUtil ;
Bug #4139: Cannot obtain public URL for shared folders;
Feature #4219: Use storage ID to download files from storage;
Feature #4186: HL: Add time to live to cache;
Feature #4216: Set a folder as System Folder;
Feature #4186: HL: Add time to live to cache;
Feature #3782: Adde guest user;
Feature #5093: Show public folders in a special folders;
Feature #5092: Add public access to history;
Feature #4186: Added support to catalogue;
Feature #5406: HomeLibrary: add support for conversation attachments;
Task #5623: HL Rest API: add a method to download a folder in zip format;
Task #5716: HL Rest API: add a method to upload a zip file;
Task #5723: HL Rest API: add a method to get the public URL of a file;
Task #5831: HL Rest API: add MySpecialFolder (VRE Folders) to list servlet;
Task #6041: Home Library: add a "catalogue" area for VRE folder
Feature #6074: HL: add Insufficient Privileges Exception to setPublic method
Bug #6075: HL: check if user has the rights to access all Public Folders
Task #5156: Home Library should support versioning;
Task #7007: Add features to HL versioning;
